<DIV style="margin-top: 3pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 3%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    The aggregate market value of the voting stock held by
    non-affiliates of the Registrant, based on the closing price of
    the Registrant&#146;s common shares on May&#160;31, 2006 of
    $13.19, as reported on the Nasdaq Global Market, was
    approximately $90.2&#160;million. Common shares held as of
    May&#160;31, 2006 by each executive officer and director and by
    each person who owns 5% or more of the outstanding common shares
    have been excluded from this computation, in that such persons
    may be deemed to be affiliates of the Registrant. This
    determination of affiliate status is not necessarily a
    conclusive determination for any other purpose.
</DIV>

    As of January&#160;31, 2007, the Registrant had outstanding
    24,661,851 common shares, no par value.
</DIV>

<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always"><A HREF="#tocpage">Table of Contents</A></H5><P>

<DIV style="width: 87%; margin-left: 6%"><!-- BEGIN LOGICAL PAGE -->

<DIV align="center" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, Helvetica; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">

    <B><FONT style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times">INFORMATION
    REGARDING FORWARD-LOOKING STATEMENTS</FONT></B>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    Statements contained in this Annual Report on
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">Form&#160;10-K</FONT>
    which are not historical facts are forward-looking statements
    within the meaning of Section&#160;21E of the
    U.S.&#160;Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended. A
    forward-looking statement may contain words such as
    &#147;anticipate that,&#148; &#147;believes,&#148;
    &#147;continue to,&#148; &#147;estimates,&#148; &#147;expects
    to,&#148; &#147;hopes,&#148; &#147;intends,&#148;
    &#147;plans,&#148; &#147;to be,&#148; &#147;will be,&#148;
    &#147;will continue to be,&#148; or similar words. These
    forward-looking statements include the statements in this Report
    regarding: future developments in our markets and the markets in
    which we expect to compete; our estimated cost reductions; our
    future ability to fund our operations; our development of new
    products and relationships; our ability to increase our customer
    base; the services that we or our customers will introduce and
    the benefits that end users will receive from these services;
    the impact of entering new markets; our plans to use or not to
    use certain types of technologies in the future; our future cost
    of revenue, gross margins and net losses; our future
    restructuring, research and development, sales and marketing,
    general and administrative, stock-based compensation and
    depreciation and amortization expenses; our future interest
    expenses; the value of our goodwill and other intangible assets;
    our future capital expenditures and capital requirements; and
    the anticipated impact of changes in applicable accounting rules.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    The accuracy of these forward-looking statements may be impacted
    by a number of business risks and uncertainties that could cause
    actual results to differ materially from those projected or
    anticipated. These risks include the risks described in
    &#147;Item&#160;1A&#160;&#151; Risk Factors&#148; below. We do
    not undertake any obligation to update this forward-looking
    information, except as required under applicable law.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    Unless the context otherwise requires, all references to
    &#147;Corel&#148;, &#147;we&#148;, &#147;our&#148;, and
    &#147;us&#148; in this Annual Report on
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">Form&#160;10-K</FONT>
    refer to Corel Corporation and its subsidiaries as of
    November&#160;30, 2006 and prior to our acquisition of
    InterVideo, Inc. &#147;WinZip&#148; refers to Cayman Ltd.
    Holdco. &#147;InterVideo&#148; refers to InterVideo, Inc.
</DIV>
<A name='101'>
<DIV style="margin-top: 18pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="center" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, Helvetica; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">

    <B><FONT style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times">PART&#160;I</FONT></B>
</DIV>
</A>
<A name='102'>
<DIV style="margin-top: 12pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, Helvetica; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">

<TR>
    <TD width="9%"></TD>
    <TD width="91%"></TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top">
    <TD>
    <B><FONT style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times">ITEM&#160;1.<I>&#160;&#160;</I></FONT></B>
</TD>
    <TD>
    <B><I><FONT style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times">BUSINESS</FONT></I></B>
</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</A>
<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    Founded in 1985, we are a leading global packaged software
    company with an estimated installed base of 40&#160;million
    current users in over 75 countries. We provide high quality,
    affordable and
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">easy-to-use</FONT>
    productivity and graphics and digital imaging software. Our
    products enjoy a favorable market position among value-conscious
    consumers and small businesses benefiting from the widespread
    global adoption of personal computers, or PCs, and digital
    cameras. The functional departments within large companies and
    governmental organizations are also attracted to the
    industry-specific features and technical capabilities of our
    software. Our products are sold through a scalable distribution
    platform comprised of equipment manufacturers, our
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">e-Store,</FONT> and
    our global network of resellers and retail vendors.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    Our product portfolio includes well-established, globally
    recognized brands. Our primary productivity products are
    <I>WordPerfect Office Suite</I>, first developed in 1982 and
    marketed by us since 1996, and <I>WinZip</I>, a compression
    utility developed in 1991, and purchased by us in May 2006.
    <I>WordPerfect Office Suite </I>is the leading
    Microsoft-alternative productivity software and includes
    Microsoft-compatible word processing, spreadsheet and
    presentation functionality. <I>WinZip </I>is the most widely
    used after-market compression utility, with more than
    40&#160;million licenses sold to date. Our <I>iGrafx
    </I>products allow enterprises to analyze, streamline and
    optimize their business processes. Our primary graphics and
    digital imaging products are <I>CorelDRAW Graphics Suite </I>and
    <I>Corel Paint Shop Pro.</I> <I>CorelDRAW Graphics Suite </I>is
    a leading illustration and image editing software suite used by
    design professionals and small businesses. <I>Corel Paint Shop
    Pro </I>digital image editing and management applications are
    used by novice and professional photographers and photo editors.
    <I>Corel Snapfire </I>is available for free, and that allows
    users to organize, enhance and share digital photos and video
    clips. <I>Corel Snapfire Plus</I>, the enhanced version, allows
    users to customize their software and add new functionality by
    purchasing additional modules, such as advanced photo or video
    editing, as they need them. <I>Corel DESIGNER Technical Suite
    </I>offers users a graphics application for creating or updating
    complex technical illustrations. <I>Corel Painter </I>is a
    digital painting application that, when used with a pen tablet,
    simulates natural media, such as watercolors, inks, oil paints,
    chalks and pastels.
</DIV>

<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    <BR>
    1
</DIV><!-- END LOGICAL PAGE -->
<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always"><A HREF="#tocpage">Table of Contents</A></H5><P>

<DIV style="width: 87%; margin-left: 6%"><!-- BEGIN LOGICAL PAGE -->

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    In December 2006, we acquired InterVideo. InterVideo has
    historically derived a substantial portion of its revenue from
    sales of its flagship product, <I>WinDVD</I>, a DVD player
    software, to PC Original Equipment Manufacturers
    (&#147;OEMs&#148;). In the future, we expect to derive an
    increasing percentage of our revenue from sales of products
    other than <I>WinDVD</I>, including:
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">

<TR>
    <TD width="4%"></TD>
    <TD width="2%"></TD>
    <TD width="94%"></TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>    &#149;&#160;
</TD>
    <TD align="left">
    <I>WinDVD Creator</I>, a video editing, DVD authoring and
    burning application;
</TD>
</TR>

<TR style="line-height: 6pt; font-size: 1pt"><TD>&nbsp;</TD></TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>    &#149;&#160;
</TD>
    <TD align="left">
    <I>InterVideo DVD Copy</I>, an application to copy and backup
    DVDs and CDs;
</TD>
</TR>

<TR style="line-height: 6pt; font-size: 1pt"><TD>&nbsp;</TD></TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>    &#149;&#160;
</TD>
    <TD align="left">
    <I>InterVideo Home Theater</I>, a media center suite for the
    viewing and management of digital media content;
</TD>
</TR>

<TR style="line-height: 6pt; font-size: 1pt"><TD>&nbsp;</TD></TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>    &#149;&#160;
</TD>
    <TD align="left">
    <I>MediaOne</I>, an
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">all-in-one</FONT>
    package of our most popular applications such as <I>WinDVD</I>,
    <I>WinDVD Creator</I>, <I>Disc Master</I>, <I>PhotoAlbum </I>and
    others;
</TD>
</TR>

<TR style="line-height: 6pt; font-size: 1pt"><TD>&nbsp;</TD></TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>    &#149;&#160;
</TD>
    <TD align="left">
    Linux-based versions of our DVD and DVR software designed for
    Linux-based PCs and CE devices;
</TD>
</TR>

<TR style="line-height: 6pt; font-size: 1pt"><TD>&nbsp;</TD></TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>    &#149;&#160;
</TD>
    <TD align="left">
    <I>InterVideo InstantOn</I>, an embedded system infrastructure
    that provides PCs with capabilities similar to those of CE
    devices, allowing PC users to access multimedia assets and
    devices without requiring booting into traditional operating
    systems such as Microsoft Windows;&#160;
</TD>
</TR>

<TR style="line-height: 6pt; font-size: 1pt"><TD>&nbsp;</TD></TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>    &#149;&#160;
</TD>
    <TD align="left">
    Ulead Systems, Inc. product offerings including Ulead <I>DVD
    MovieFactory</I>, a consumer DVD authoring software;
</TD>
</TR>

<TR style="line-height: 6pt; font-size: 1pt"><TD>&nbsp;</TD></TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>    &#149;&#160;
</TD>
    <TD align="left">
    <I>VideoStudio</I>, a video editing software; and
</TD>
</TR>

<TR style="line-height: 6pt; font-size: 1pt"><TD>&nbsp;</TD></TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>    &#149;&#160;
</TD>
    <TD align="left">
    <I>PhotoImpact</I>, an image editing software.
</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>

<DIV style="margin-top: 12pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, Helvetica; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">

    <B><FONT style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times">Corporate
    History</FONT></B>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    We were incorporated in Canada under the <I>Canada Business
    Corporations Act</I> in May 1985. In January 1989, we released
    <I>CorelDRAW</I>, a market-leading full-featured graphics
    software product. In November 1989, we completed an initial
    public offering of our common shares. In January 1996, we
    acquired the <I>WordPerfect </I>family of software products. In
    August 2003, we were acquired in a going private transaction by
    Vector Capital and were continued as a corporation organized
    under the <I>Business Corporations Act
    (Ontario).</I>&#160;&#160;Following our acquisition by Vector
    Capital, we undertook a significant restructuring of our
    business. As part of this restructuring, we divested our
    underperforming product lines, discontinued speculative research
    and development activity, refocused on our core product
    offerings and implemented company-wide expense reduction
    measures. In October 2004, we acquired Jasc Software, a leading
    provider of digital imaging software. In December 2005 we were
    continued as a corporation organized under the <I>Canada
    Business Corporations Act.</I> In May 2006, we acquired WinZip
    and completed an initial public offering of our common shares on
    the TSX and the Nasdaq Global Market. In December 2006, we
    acquired InterVideo.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 12pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, Helvetica; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">

    <B><FONT style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times">Our
    Industry</FONT></B>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    Prior to the mid-1990s, the packaged software industry was
    characterized by high annual growth rates, rapid technological
    innovation and a relatively large number of viable software
    providers within each product category. Over the past decade the
    industry has matured, growth rates have become more stable and
    market share within each major product category has become
    highly concentrated, with one or two companies having a dominant
    market position. We estimate that Microsoft Corporation&#146;s
    Microsoft Office has in excess of 97% of the North American
    market for productivity software and that Adobe Systems
    Incorporated has in excess of 50% of the global packaged
    graphics and digital imaging software market. Growth rates of
    packaged software sales in emerging economies are expected to be
    higher than for the global packaged software market as a whole
    resulting from more rapidly increasing PC adoption rates in
    these markets.
</DIV>

<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    <BR>
    2
</DIV><!-- END LOGICAL PAGE -->
<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always"><A HREF="#tocpage">Table of Contents</A></H5><P>

<DIV style="width: 87%; margin-left: 6%"><!-- BEGIN LOGICAL PAGE -->

<DIV style="margin-top: 12pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, Helvetica; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">

    <B><FONT style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times">Our
    Strategy</FONT></B>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    Our objective is to profitably grow our installed base of
    customers and increase sales to our existing users. We plan to
    achieve this objective through the following strategies:
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">

<TR>
    <TD width="4%"></TD>
    <TD width="2%"></TD>
    <TD width="94%"></TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>    &#149;&#160;
</TD>
    <TD align="left">
    <I>Leverage existing platform and brands to maximize value from
    acquisitions.</I>&#160;&#160;We are actively seeking to acquire
    complimentary businesses to ours. Our acquisition and
    integration strategy is focused on acquisitions of companies
    with proven and complementary products and established user
    bases that we believe will be accretive to earnings. As part of
    this strategy, in October 2004 we acquired Jasc to extend our
    reach in graphics and digital imaging software, in May 2006 we
    acquired WinZip to enhance our productivity software offerings,
    and in December 2006 we acquired InterVideo to expand our
    presence in the digital media software market by creating a
    broad portfolio of digital imaging and DVD video products. We
    analyze acquisition candidates and effect acquisition
    transactions to ensure they meet our strategic and operational
    objectives. We seek acquisition candidates that we believe can
    benefit from our existing global marketing, sales, distribution
    and general and administrative infrastructure.
</TD>
</TR>

<TR style="line-height: 6pt; font-size: 1pt"><TD>&nbsp;</TD></TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>    &#149;&#160;
</TD>
    <TD align="left">
    <I>Broaden our distribution network to capitalize on the rapid
    adoption of low cost technologies.</I>&#160;&#160;We view our
    relationships with OEMs, other distributors and online services
    companies as key growth drivers, and we are focused on forging
    new distribution relationships and broadening our existing
    relationships. To accomplish this goal, we have implemented a
    flexible &#147;channel friendly&#148; strategy of providing
    customized solutions tailored to the specific business needs of
    OEMs, other distributors and online services companies. We offer
    these parties:
</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">

<TR>
    <TD width="10%"></TD>
    <TD width="2%"></TD>
    <TD width="88%"></TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>    &#149;&#160;
</TD>
    <TD align="left">
    attractive pricing;
</TD>
</TR>

<TR style="line-height: 6pt; font-size: 1pt"><TD>&nbsp;</TD></TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>    &#149;&#160;
</TD>
    <TD align="left">
    marketing and sales support and incentives;
</TD>
</TR>

<TR style="line-height: 6pt; font-size: 1pt"><TD>&nbsp;</TD></TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>    &#149;&#160;
</TD>
    <TD align="left">
    customized versions of our software; and
</TD>
</TR>

<TR style="line-height: 6pt; font-size: 1pt"><TD>&nbsp;</TD></TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>    &#149;&#160;
</TD>
    <TD align="left">
    private label packaging and customized promotional materials.
</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">

<TR>
    <TD width="4%"></TD>
    <TD width="2%"></TD>
    <TD width="94%"></TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>    &#149;&#160;
</TD>
    <TD align="left">
    <I>Increase upgrade conversion rates.</I>&#160;&#160;Increasing
    upgrade conversion rates represents a significant incremental
    revenue opportunity for us. We intend to increase upgrade
    conversion rates through a number of strategic initiatives,
    including:
</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">

<TR>
    <TD width="10%"></TD>
    <TD width="2%"></TD>
    <TD width="88%"></TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>    &#149;&#160;
</TD>
    <TD align="left">
    increasing our database of registered users through on-line
    registration for new products to market product upgrades to them
    more effectively;
</TD>
</TR>

<TR style="line-height: 6pt; font-size: 1pt"><TD>&nbsp;</TD></TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>    &#149;&#160;
</TD>
    <TD align="left">
    embedding upgrade information directly in our software and
    employing other types of proactive marketing within our products
    including access to Tips and Tricks, product tutorials, online
    communities and special offers from Corel and our partners; and
</TD>
</TR>

<TR style="line-height: 6pt; font-size: 1pt"><TD>&nbsp;</TD></TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>    &#149;&#160;
</TD>
    <TD align="left">
    offering products in tiers of functionality, such as
    entry-level, advanced and expert versions, enabling users at
    varying levels of product knowledge and sophistication to
    purchase the applications they need and then migrate to the more
    advanced versions over time.
</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">

<TR>
    <TD width="4%"></TD>
    <TD width="2%"></TD>
    <TD width="94%"></TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>    &#149;&#160;
</TD>
    <TD align="left">
    <I>Expand presence in emerging markets.</I>&#160;&#160;We are
    expanding our presence in emerging markets, such as China,
    India, Eastern Europe and Latin America, by continuing to
    localize our products in additional languages, expanding our
    reseller network and direct sales force and developing
    additional regionally-focused versions of our
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">e-Store.</FONT> We
    believe these markets represent attractive growth opportunities
    for us because they are characterized by first time users of low
    cost PCs and digital cameras who have not yet developed loyalty
    to a particular brand of software. However, expansion of our
    operations in these emerging markets will involve a number of
    risks, challenges and uncertainties. See
    &#147;Item&#160;1A&#160;&#151; Risk Factors&#160;&#151; <I>We
    are subject to risks associated with international operations
    that may harm our business</I>.&#148;
</TD>
</TR>

<TR style="line-height: 6pt; font-size: 1pt"><TD>&nbsp;</TD></TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>    &#149;&#160;
</TD>
    <TD align="left">
    <I>Continue to respond to user needs to better serve specific
    market sectors and increase loyalty.</I>&#160;&#160;We will
    continue to work with our current customer base to help us
    develop additional product innovations,
</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>

<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    <BR>
    3
</DIV><!-- END LOGICAL PAGE -->

<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always"><A HREF="#tocpage">Table of Contents</A></H5><P>

<DIV style="width: 87%; margin-left: 6%"><!-- BEGIN LOGICAL PAGE -->

<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">

<TR>
    <TD width="4%"></TD>
    <TD width="2%"></TD>
    <TD width="94%"></TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>
</TD>
    <TD align="left">
    improve our products to better meet the needs of specific market
    segments and strengthen user loyalty. We have had significant
    success through our offering of high quality products for
    specific markets such as the legal and education sectors, and,
    as we continue to expand, we plan to target additional markets.
</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">

<TR>
    <TD width="4%"></TD>
    <TD width="2%"></TD>
    <TD width="94%"></TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>    &#149;&#160;
</TD>
    <TD align="left">
    <I>Continue to deliver high operating margins and positive cash
    flow.</I>&#160;&#160;We are committed to maximizing our
    operating margins and positive cash flow by keeping research and
    development activities focused on market driven, add-on
    functionality, utility and geographic reach of our existing
    product lines rather than speculative projects. We employ
    disciplined cost management policies and maintain stringent
    minimum
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">return-on-investment</FONT>
    criteria for our acquisition strategies. Our existing
    administrative, marketing and distribution infrastructure is
    highly scalable, and we believe it will enable us to grow our
    revenues without experiencing a proportionate increase in fixed
    costs, and continue to deliver high operating margins.
</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>

<DIV style="margin-top: 12pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, Helvetica; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">

    <B><FONT style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times">Our
    Products</FONT></B>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    We provide high quality, affordable, and
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">easy-to-use</FONT>
    productivity and graphics and digital imaging software. The
    following table identifies our major software products within
    our two principal product categories:
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV style="font-size: 1pt; margin-left: 0%; width: 13%; align: left; border-bottom: 1pt solid #000000"></DIV><!-- callerid=999 iwidth=455 length=60 -->

<DIV style="margin-top: 3pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>



<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">

<TR>
    <TD width="1%"></TD>
    <TD width="1%"></TD>
    <TD width="98%"></TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD valign="top">
    * </TD>
    <TD></TD>
    <TD valign="bottom">
    Entry-level suggested retail price reflects our suggested retail
    price as of November&#160;30, 2006 for the respective products.
    This table does not reflect the prices for upgrade versions of
    our software products or products that are bundled with hardware
    or services and sold through OEMs.</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>

<DIV style="margin-top: 12pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, Helvetica; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">

    <B><FONT style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times">Productivity</FONT></B>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    Our productivity products include <I>WordPerfect Office
    Suite</I>, <I>WinZip </I>and our <I>iGrafx </I>products.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    <I>WordPerfect Office Suite.</I>&#160;&#160;The <I>Standard
    Edition </I>of <I>WordPerfect Office Suite</I> includes the
    <I>WordPerfect, Quattro Pro </I>and <I>Presentations
    </I>applications. Depending on the version of the suite,
    <I>WordPerfect MAIL </I>and <I>Paradox </I>are also available.
    <I>WordPerfect </I>is an
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">easy-to-use</FONT>
    word processing application that includes the ability to
    integrate charts, tables, images and graphics. <I>Quattro Pro
    </I>is a spreadsheet and database application with 3D chart
    functionality. <I>Presentations</I> is an application for
    producing multimedia presentations, overheads and
    transparencies. <I>WordPerfect MAIL </I>is an
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">e-mail,</FONT>
    calendaring and contact management application. <I>Paradox
    </I>is a database application.
</DIV>

<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    <BR>
    4
</DIV><!-- END LOGICAL PAGE -->
<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always"><A HREF="#tocpage">Table of Contents</A></H5><P>

<DIV style="width: 87%; margin-left: 6%"><!-- BEGIN LOGICAL PAGE -->

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    <I>WordPerfect Office Suite </I>is an innovative, full-featured
    software suite. <I>WordPerfect Office Suite </I>is the leading
    alternative to Microsoft Office. Our <I>WordPerfect Office Suite
    </I>applications which are compatible with Microsoft
    Office&#146;s applications, allow users to open and save
    documents in multiple versions of the Microsoft Word, Excel and
    PowerPoint file formats. In addition, our software allows users
    to publish their documents in HTML and XML file formats. Users
    may also publish their documents in portable document format, or
    PDF, a feature not currently included with Microsoft Office
    applications. Our <I>Workspace Manager </I>gives users the
    option to choose Word, Excel or PowerPoint modes and re-arrange
    the menus and short-cut keys as they would appear and function
    in the respective Microsoft applications, making it easier for a
    new user to adopt <I>WordPerfect Office Suite.</I>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    <I>WordPerfect Office Suite </I>is currently available in five
    languages and is used principally by governments, legal
    professionals and corporate legal departments, academic
    institutions, small-to medium-sized businesses and individual
    consumers. Within a business setting, the program is
    particularly useful in departments that produce or edit a high
    volume of long, heavily formatted documents.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    In addition to the <I>Standard Edition </I>of <I>WordPerfect
    Office Suite</I>, we offer three enhanced versions for
    corporate, home and small business users: our <I>Professional
    Edition </I>including <I>Paradox</I>, making the <I>Professional
    Edition </I>a competitive alternative to Microsoft Office
    Professional; our <I>Home Edition</I> including additional
    features tailored for home users including a task manager,
    multi-media tools, home templates and anti-virus software; and
    our <I>Small Business Edition </I>including additional features
    tailored for our small business users such as a task manager,
    <I>WordPerfect MAIL</I>, additional business templates, <I>Corel
    Paint Shop Pro </I>and anti-virus software.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    <I>WinZip.</I>&#160;&#160;As one of the most frequently
    downloaded software products available on the Internet with over
    150&#160;million downloads to date, WinZip has developed a
    strong and highly recognizable brand. The <I>WinZip </I>product
    line includes three primary products: <I>WinZip</I>, <I>WinZip
    Companion for Outlook </I>and <I>WinZip Self
    Extractor.</I>&#160;&#160;<I>WinZip </I>is a widely used
    compression utility for the Windows platform, allowing users to
    reduce temporarily the size of their computer files for more
    effective transmission and storage. <I>WinZip </I>also includes
    encryption functionality to provide additional security in
    protecting sensitive information. <I>WinZip </I>is based on the
    .zip file format, but also supports a number of alternative
    compression formats. <I>WinZip Companion for Outlook </I>extends
    <I>WinZip</I>&#146;s functionality to Microsoft&#146;s Outlook
    email application, automating the compression and encryption of
    email file attachments. <I>WinZip Self Extractor </I>allows
    users to create archives that can be uncompressed without the
    need for the <I>WinZip </I>application.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    <I>WinZip </I>has a broad user base that includes individual
    consumers, small-to medium-sized businesses and large
    corporations. <I>WinZip </I>is used worldwide, and is currently
    available in five languages. <I>WinZip</I>&#146;s main
    competitors include commercial software such as PKZip, Stuffit,
    and WinRAR, open-source software such as 7-Zip and the basic
    compression functionality integrated into the Windows operating
    systems. <I>WinZip</I>&#146;s reliability,
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">ease-of-use,</FONT>
    functionality and loyal user base has allowed it to compete
    effectively with these offerings.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    <I>iGrafx FlowCharter and iGrafx Process.</I>&#160;&#160;Our
    <I>iGrafx </I>products allow enterprises to analyze, streamline
    and optimize their business processes. <I>iGrafx&#146;s </I>main
    products are <I>iGrafx FlowCharter </I>and <I>iGrafx
    Process.</I>&#160;&#160;Uses of <I>iGrafx FlowCharter
    </I>include visually depicting the elements of a business
    process such as a supply chain solution. Uses of <I>iGrafx
    Process </I>include identifying, simulating and visually
    presenting how a business can improve its business processes.
    <I>iGrafx&#146;s </I>main competitors are IDS-Scheer Aris,
    Proforma ProVision and Casewise Corporate Modeler. <I>iGrafx
    </I>products are currently offered in six languages.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 12pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, Helvetica; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">

    <B><FONT style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times">Graphics
    and Digital Imaging</FONT></B>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 2%; margin-right: 0%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, Helvetica; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">

    <B><I><FONT style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times">Graphics</FONT></I></B>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    Our graphics products include <I>CorelDRAW Graphics Suite</I>,
    <I>Corel DESIGNER Technical Suite </I>and <I>Corel Painter.</I>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    <I>CorelDRAW Graphics Suite.</I>&#160;&#160;<I>CorelDRAW
    Graphics Suite </I>is an industry-leading vector illustration
    software application and has received over 300 industry awards
    throughout the 17&#160;years it has been on the
</DIV>

<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    <BR>
    5
</DIV><!-- END LOGICAL PAGE -->
<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always"><A HREF="#tocpage">Table of Contents</A></H5><P>

<DIV style="width: 87%; margin-left: 6%"><!-- BEGIN LOGICAL PAGE -->

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    market. The software allows users to create, manipulate and
    publish drawings and images in a variety of media including in
    print and on the web. Examples of its uses include creating
    logos, brochures, newsletters, reports, advertisements, signs,
    embroidery designs and technical illustrations. <I>CorelDraw
    Graphics Suite</I> consists of applications for illustration,
    page layout and digital imaging and motion graphics creation.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    <I>CorelDRAW Graphics Suite </I>is
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">easy-to-use</FONT>
    and is compatible with most industry standard file formats,
    allowing the import and export of files in the common formats
    used by our competitors, including Adobe and its offerings,
    Adobe Creative Suite and Adobe Illustrator, and Microsoft.
    <I>CorelDRAW Graphics Suite</I> is used principally by graphic
    designers and sales and marketing personnel and is currently
    available in seventeen languages.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    <I>Corel DESIGNER Technical Suite.</I>&#160;&#160;<I>Corel
    DESIGNER Technical Suite </I>offers users a graphics application
    for creating or updating complex technical illustrations. The
    suite consists of <I>Corel DESIGNER </I>for design, illustration
    and page layout, <I>Corel PHOTO-PAINT </I>for digital image
    editing and <I>Corel TRACE</I> for the conversion of bitmaps to
    vector images. We also offer <I>Corel DESIGNER Professional
    </I>which includes a filter for importing 3D computer-aided
    design diagrams.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    <I>Corel DESIGNER Technical Suite </I>is currently available in
    three languages and is primarily used by engineering departments
    and technical publishers, who use the software to create
    professional-quality graphics that can be easily used in
    business documents, presentations and web and intranet pages.
    Examples of its uses include creating product manuals, assembly
    instructions and product specification diagrams. <I>Corel
    DESIGNER Technical Suite </I>is also used in the manufacturing,
    automotive and aerospace industries from the conceptualization
    stage, through the design specification stage, to the production
    of technical manuals and marketing material. <I>Corel DESIGNER
    Technical Suite </I>provides an
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">easy-to-use</FONT>
    technical illustration application at an affordable price
    compared to its main competitors IsoDRAW, Autodesk AutoCAD LT
    and Deneba Canvas.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    <I>Corel Painter.</I>&#160;&#160;<I>Corel Painter </I>is a
    digital painting application that, when used with a pen tablet,
    simulates natural media, such as watercolors, inks, oil paints,
    chalks and pastels. Users include commercial artists,
    professional photographers, fine artists and professional
    digital artists who wish to create new works of art or enhance
    existing images. Because it is compatible with Adobe Photoshop,
    <I>Corel Painter </I>provides additional natural media
    functionality not otherwise available with Photoshop. <I>Corel
    Painter&#146;</I>s main competitor is Alias Sketchbook. <I>Corel
    Painter </I>is currently available in six languages.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 12pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 2%; margin-right: 0%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, Helvetica; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">

    <B><I><FONT style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times">Digital
    Imaging</FONT></I></B>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    Our digital imaging products include <I>Corel Paint Shop
    Pro</I>, <I>Corel Photo Album </I>and <I>Corel Snapfire.</I>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    <I>Corel Paint Shop Pro.</I>&#160;&#160;<I>Corel Paint Shop Pro
    </I>allows users to create, manipulate and manage digital images
    with photo editing, digital art and precision graphic design
    tools. Primary examples of its uses include digitally altering
    photos by fixing scratches and blemishes, changing colors,
    digitally removing people, objects and &#147;red-eye&#148; from
    photos and combining photographs into collages. <I>Corel Paint
    Shop Pro </I>provides advanced functionality at an affordable
    price to users of digital cameras ranging from novices to
    professionals, graphics hobbyists and business users. Adobe
    Photoshop, a competing product, sells at a higher price and is
    directed at professional graphic designers. <I>Corel Paint Shop
    Pro </I>is currently available in seven languages.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    <I>Corel Photo Album.</I>&#160;&#160;<I>Corel Photo Album
    </I>allows users to store, organize, share and manage their
    digital photograph collections. Our software organizes
    photographs on users&#146; computers by date, folder, keyword or
    other desired criteria. Users of <I>Corel Photo Album </I>can
    organize and publish photo albums, create scrap-books, print and
    share photographs, create slide shows and create CD and DVD
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">back-ups</FONT> of
    digital images. In addition, the software provides basic
    photograph enhancement capability which seamlessly integrates
    with Paint Shop Pro for more advanced image editing. <I>Corel
    Photo Album&#146;s </I>main competitors are Adobe Photoshop
    Elements and Microsoft Digital Image Suite. <I>Corel Photo
    Album</I> is currently available in seven languages.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    <I>Corel Snapfire and Snapfire Plus.</I>&#160;&#160;<I>Corel
    Snapfire </I>is a digital imaging application that allows users
    to manage, improve and find images and videos. It is available
    for free download on our website,&#160;&#160;www.corel.com.
    <I>Corel Snapfire Plus</I> contains additional features and is
    available to customers for purchase. Due to their modular
    design, users can also add new functionality to both <I>Corel
    Snapfire </I>and <I>Corel Snapfire </I>
</DIV>

<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    <BR>
    6
</DIV><!-- END LOGICAL PAGE -->

<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always"><A HREF="#tocpage">Table of Contents</A></H5><P>

<DIV style="width: 87%; margin-left: 6%"><!-- BEGIN LOGICAL PAGE -->

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    <I>Plus </I>by upgrading to additional new product features as
    they require. This provides users with additional levels of
    control and flexibility in customizing their software experience
    and provides for additional revenue generation for us. <I>Corel
    Snapfire</I>&#146;s main competitors include Google Picasa,
    Simplestar PhotoShow, and the imaging capability built into
    Windows Vista.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    In December 2006, we acquired InterVideo, and its digital
    imaging software products. InterVideo has historically derived a
    substantial portion of its revenue from sales of its flagship
    product, <I>WinDVD</I>, a DVD player software, to PC OEMs. In
    the future, we expect to derive an increasing percentage of our
    revenue from sales of products other than <I>WinDVD.</I>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 12pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 2%; margin-right: 0%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, Helvetica; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">

    <B><I><FONT style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times">Customer
    Support</FONT></I></B>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    We provide several customer support options to meet the varied
    needs of our customers. Support options range from 24&#160;hour
    7&#160;day a week free support via the Internet to fee-based
    options through maintenance agreements for enterprise customers
    or on a per incident basis for individual consumers. Our
    customer service representatives provide technical support,
    answer questions about product specifications, sell our products
    and provide replacement media and documentation. We maintain a
    database of technical support articles on our web site that is
    updated regularly with useful information and frequently asked
    questions and answers regarding our products. We maintain an
    Internet news group to provide users with a mechanism to provide
    feedback as well as receive technical updates and notes. We also
    provide
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">up-to-date</FONT>
    information about common issues and useful tips on our web site.
    The majority of our in-house customer support personnel are
    located in Ottawa, Canada and Maidenhead, England.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 12pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, Helvetica; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">

    <B><FONT style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times">Distribution,
    Sales and Marketing</FONT></B>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 2%; margin-right: 0%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, Helvetica; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">

    <B><I><FONT style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times">Distribution</FONT></I></B>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    We have a global, multi-channel distribution network, including
    OEMs, the Internet, retailers and resellers, in over 75
    countries through which we are able to distribute our software.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    <I>OEMs.</I>&#160;&#160;We distribute our productivity and
    graphics and digital imaging software under license agreements
    with OEMs granting them the right to distribute copies of our
    software installed on their hardware products. We have
    relationships with over 70 OEMs, including Dell, Wacom,
    Hewlett-Packard, NEC and Toshiba.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    <I>Internet Distribution.</I>&#160;&#160;Our
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">e-Store</FONT>
    allows consumers to purchase most of our software products
    directly from us and is our fastest growing distribution
    channel. In 2006, our e-Store revenue in North America grew 46%
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">year-over-year.</FONT>
    Our eStore is the central hub for all After Point of Sale and
    OEM sales.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">

    channel encompasses our relationships with over 25,000
    resellers, including the following:

    facilitates sales through other channels and the establishment

    enterprise clients.

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, Helvetica; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">

    <B><FONT style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times">Internal
    Systems</FONT></B>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    We use various standard applications to provide a flexible and
    scalable infrastructure to accommodate growth and information
    needs. We use in-house development resources to maintain these
    systems and provide custom integration of applications to meet
    our reporting and business needs. The primary applications we
    use include Oracle for financial controls, reporting and human
    resources, IBM Websphere for our
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">e-Store,</FONT>
    Onyx customer relationship management database for customer and
    prospective customer information and RightNow Technology
    interactive knowledge base for customer and technical support.
    We believe these systems are sufficient to accommodate our
    anticipated growth.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 12pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, Helvetica; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">

    <B><FONT style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times">Outsourced
    Manufacturing</FONT></B>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    ModusLink manufactures the principal materials and components
    used in the physically packaged versions of our products,
    including diskettes and CD-ROMs, product manuals and packaging,
    pursuant to a fixed price agreement. ModusLink prepares items to
    our specifications at manufacturing sites in the U.S.,
    Netherlands and Taiwan and engages third-party printers for the
    printing of the packaging and the manuals to be included with
    our packaged software. We provide ModusLink with all packaging
    and manual design templates.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 12pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, Helvetica; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">

    <B><FONT style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times">Intellectual
    Property</FONT></B>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    Our intellectual property rights are important to our business.
    We rely on a combination of trademark, patent, copyright, trade
    secret, and other common law in the U.S., Canada and other
    jurisdictions, as well as confidentiality procedures and
    contractual provisions to protect our proprietary technology,
    processes and other intellectual property. We have obtained
    registrations for many different trademarks in more than 60
    separate countries, have numerous issued patents in the U.S. and
    Canada and own many copyright registrations. Our patents expire
    on various dates between 2010 and 2021. As part of our hiring
    process, we typically require
</DIV>

<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    <BR>
    8
</DIV><!-- END LOGICAL PAGE -->
<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always"><A HREF="#tocpage">Table of Contents</A></H5><P>

<DIV style="width: 87%; margin-left: 6%"><!-- BEGIN LOGICAL PAGE -->

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    employees to execute written agreements containing
    confidentiality undertakings, intellectual property assignments
    and non-competition and non-solicitation obligations in our
    favor.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    In addition to the foregoing, we believe the technological and
    creative skill of our personnel, product developments and
    frequent product enhancements are essential to establishing and
    maintaining a competitive advantage.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    Our products contain content and technology that we license from
    third parties. We generally enter into written agreements with
    independent contractors, consultants, strategic partners and
    third party content and technology providers, and through these
    written agreements,we seek to obtain and control access to, and
    distribution of, the intellectual property rights necessary for
    the continued marketing of our products.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    Despite our efforts to protect our intellectual property, third
    parties may use, copy or otherwise obtain and market or
    distribute our intellectual property or technology without our
    authorization or otherwise develop products with the same
    functionality as our products. Policing unauthorized use of our
    products and intellectual property is costly and virtually
    impossible on a worldwide basis. As a result, there is a risk
    that our efforts to protect our intellectual property will not
    be adequate to fully prevent the misappropriation of our
    intellectual property, particularly in emerging markets. See
    &#147;Item&#160;1A&#160;&#151; Risk Factors&#160;&#151; <I>Our
    success depends heavily on our ability to adequately protect our
    intellectual property</I>.&#148;
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 12pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, Helvetica; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">

    <B><FONT style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times">Competition</FONT></B>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    We compete with other software vendors for customers at the
    retail level and in corporate accounts, and for access to
    distribution channels. Our two primary competitors are Microsoft
    and Adobe. We believe that Microsoft Office has in excess of 97%
    of the North American market for productivity software and that
    Adobe has in excess of 50% of the global packaged graphics and
    digital imaging software market. We are the next largest
    provider of packaged productivity and graphics and digital
    imaging software in our target markets. We also compete with a
    number of smaller companies that target certain sectors of the
    packaged software market.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    <I>WordPerfect </I>and our graphics and digital imaging products
    provide features and technical capabilities that are generally
    comparable to higher-priced products offered by Microsoft and
    Adobe. We believe we further distinguish ourselves from our
    competitors by offering products that are
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">easy-to-use</FONT>
    and can interoperate with other major file formats.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    We also compete for strategic relationships with OEMs, online
    services companies and other distributors. We believe we can
    provide distributors with attractive pricing, channel specific
    marketing and sales support, incentives and customized versions
    of our products and packaging. We believe tailored responses to
    distributors&#146; needs distinguishes us from our competition
    and will allow us to broaden our distribution network.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 12pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, Helvetica; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">

    <B><FONT style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times">Research
    and Development</FONT></B>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    We have a research and development team of 189 software
    professionals, the majority of whom are located at our corporate
    headquarters in Ottawa. Upon the acquisition of us by Vector
    Capital, we shifted our focus from the development of new and
    unproven applications to a disciplined commitment to increasing
    the functionality, utility and geographic reach of our core
    software products. We plan to expand our product offerings
    through the acquisition of proven products and technology and to
    employ our research and development efforts to improve the
    utility of those products and technology to our customers. Our
    research and development expenses for our fiscal years ended
    November&#160;30, 2004, 2005 and 2006 were $14.6&#160;million,
    $23.5&#160;million and $25.9&#160;million, respectively.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    Our commitment to providing high-quality and useful software has
    led us to a more user-focused method of development. We rely on
    our intimate knowledge of the tasks and goals that users wish to
    accomplish to determine how our products should be changed so
    that we offer the greatest
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">ease-of-use</FONT>
    and functionality to our customers. For example,
    <I>CorelDRAW&#160;X3</I> added many workflow enhancements for
    existing users, and a fresh learning paradigm to allow new users
    to quickly become effective with the product. <I>Corel
    Painter&#160;IX.5</I> added the Photo Painting System, and
    support for the new Wacom 6D Art Pen. <I>WinZip&#160;11</I> adds
    greater
</DIV>

<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    <BR>
    9
</DIV><!-- END LOGICAL PAGE -->
<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always"><A HREF="#tocpage">Table of Contents</A></H5><P>

<DIV style="width: 87%; margin-left: 6%"><!-- BEGIN LOGICAL PAGE -->

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    capabilities for network deployment of corporate installations;
    it also adds the ability to open popular emerging compression
    formats and the ability to directly view images stored in WinZip
    files. Similar examples are available for all of our products.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    User feedback also lets us target the development of derivative
    products that leverage our existing technologies for use in
    specific markets. For example, we have developed a version of
    our CorelDRAW product called <I>Corel DRAWings</I> for the
    embroidery market. Corel <I>DRAWings</I> integrates with
    embroidery machines to allow users to easily create and
    visualize designs and then to automatically transfer the stitch
    patterns to the desired fabric. <I>Corel Painter Essentials</I>,
    shipped by Wacom with many of its tablets, provides a quick and
    easy introduction to digital painting&#160;&#151; while
    simultaneously satisfying a partner need and providing an
    appetite for the full Corel Painter product from which it is
    derived.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    Another active focus for us is expanding the breadth of
    distribution of our products through innovation around the
    business models for each of our products. We develop customized
    versions of our products that allow us to reach new markets, or
    reach existing markets in new ways. <I>Corel Snapfire</I> is a
    photo-organizing, editing and sharing application that is
    available for free download from Corel.com that provides an
    up-sell path to <I>Corel Snapfire Plus</I>, a version of the
    same application with wider capabilities. Working with Dell, we
    have also created a starter edition version of <I>Corel Snapfire
    Plus</I> which ships with all of their consumer PCs. The
    Snapfire platform is providing us with a new way of engaging
    both traditional (hardware OEM) and non-traditional partners,
    and the same model is being expanded out to encompass our other
    products.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 12pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, Helvetica; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">

    <B><FONT style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times">Employees</FONT></B>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    As of November&#160;30, 2006, we had approximately
    608&#160;full-time employees, of which 219 employees were
    engaged in sales and marketing, 189 were engaged in research and
    development and the remaining 200 were engaged in general
    administration, finance and customer support. We have employees
    in 17 countries, including 515 employees in our North American
    operations, 78 employees in Europe, the Middle East and Africa
    (&#147;EMEA&#148;) and 15 employees in other areas of the world
    as of November&#160;30, 2006. In addition, as a result of our
    acquisition of InterVideo on December&#160;12, 2006, we have
    added approximately&#160;800 new employees as at the time of the
    closing of the transaction.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    We believe that our future success will depend in large part on
    our ability to attract and retain highly skilled technical,
    managerial, and sales and marketing personnel. Competition for
    employees is intense in the software industry. To date, we
    believe we have been successful in our efforts to recruit
    qualified employees, but there is a risk that we will not
    continue to be successful in the future. See
    &#147;Item&#160;1A&#160;&#151; Risk Factors&#160;&#151; <I>We
    rely on our ability to recruit and retain qualified
    employees</I>.&#148; None of our employees are subject to
    collective bargaining agreements. Management believes relations
    with employees are generally good.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 12pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, Helvetica; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">

    <B><FONT style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times">Acquisition
    of InterVideo</FONT></B>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    On December&#160;12, 2006, we completed the acquisition of
    InterVideo, a leading provider of digital media authoring and
    playback software, with a focus on high-definition video and DVD
    technologies. We purchased InterVideo for $13.00&#160;per share
    of InterVideo common stock resulting in an aggregate acquisition
    price of $198.6&#160;million in an all cash transaction. We
    financed the acquisition through a combination of our cash
    reserves, InterVideo&#146;s cash reserves and debt financing
    which included an amendment to our existing credit agreement to
    increase available term borrowings by $70.0&#160;million.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    Our acquisition of InterVideo will have a significant impact on
    our assets, revenue, income, and cash flows. The acquisition is
    deemed to be of the highest level of significance under
    Regulation S-X based on assets, net income and the purchase
    price.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    This acquisition substantially expands our presence in the
    digital media software market by creating a broad portfolio of
    digital imaging and DVD video products. With the addition of
    InterVideo, we will deliver
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">easy-to-use,</FONT>
    multi-purpose high-definition video, imaging, and DVD creation
    products to consumers and enterprises worldwide while extending
    our presence in emerging markets. The acquisition combines our
    key strengths&#160;&#151; business model innovation,
    understanding of end user requirements and established
    distribution in
</DIV>

<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    <BR>
    10
</DIV><!-- END LOGICAL PAGE -->
<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always"><A HREF="#tocpage">Table of Contents</A></H5><P>

<DIV style="width: 87%; margin-left: 6%"><!-- BEGIN LOGICAL PAGE -->

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    the Americas and Europe&#160;&#151; with InterVideo&#146;s core
    assets, which include video technology innovation, established
    partnerships with the world&#146;s leading PC OEM partners and
    strong market presence in the Asia Pacific region.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    In 2005, InterVideo acquired a majority interest in Ulead, a
    leading developer of video imaging and DVD authoring software
    for desktop, server, mobile and Internet platforms. We completed
    the acquisition of the remaining interest in Ulead on
    December&#160;28, 2006.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    There are many expected cost synergies that will arise from this
    acquisition, which will result in an expected reduction of the
    combined companies&#146; expenses across all functions as a
    percentage of total sales. We are in the process of executing
    our integration and restructuring plan to meet these cost
    reduction targets. This restructuring plan includes the
    integration of financial systems, information technology and
    human resource processes. We expect significant restructuring
    activity to be completed by the end of the second quarter of our
    fiscal year ending November&#160;30, 2007.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    We have converted outstanding stock options held by InterVideo
    employees into options to purchase our common shares. We have
    also assumed pension obligations under benefit plans of various
    InterVideo employees.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    For the nine months ended September&#160;30, 2006, InterVideo
    generated revenues of $86.0&#160;million as compared to
    $78.5&#160;million for the comparable period in the prior year,
    representing a 9.5% increase. InterVideo generated positive net
    income and operating cash flows for both of the
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">nine-month</FONT>
    periods ended September&#160;30, 2006 and 2005.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

    9.5
</TD>

    %
